resources.string: Rockets SpaceX: Explore SpaceX\'s innovative designs and powerful launch vehicles.
Dragon spacecraft SpaceX: Learn about the revolutionary vessels for cargo and crewed missions
Landpad SpaceX: A designated platform for rocket landings, equipped with guiding markers and the SpaceX logo, often located on ocean barges or coastal sites.
Last news NASA: Catch up on today\'s top news and major world events
Technologies NASA: Explore NASA\'s groundbreaking technologies transforming space and Earth.
Asteroids NASA: Uncover the secrets of asteroids: their origins, orbits, and potential Earth impacts.
